sections.title: Questions - Rules and Conditions for affixing the CE marking - Article 30

questions.title: Visibility, Legibility, and Indelibility
questions.content: Is the CE marking affixed **visibly, legibly, and indelibly** to the product with digital elements?

responses.title: In Progress
responses.description: Work is underway but not yet completed.

questions.title: Placement on Packaging / EU Declaration (If Product Cannot Bear It)
questions.content:
If the nature of the product prevents affixing the CE marking directly, is it instead affixed to:
- the **packaging**,
- and/or the **EU Declaration of Conformity** accompanying the product?

questions.title: Affixing on Software Products
questions.content:
For software-only products, is the CE marking affixed:
- either to the **EU Declaration of Conformity**,
- or to the **notice section of the website** listed in the Declaration,
- ensuring it is **easily and directly accessible** to consumers?

questions.title: Minimum Height Requirement
questions.content: Is the CE marking at least **5 mm in height**, unless the small size of the product justifies a smaller marking that still remains visible and legible?

responses.title: In Progress
responses.description: Work is underway but not yet completed.

questions.title: Timing (Before Market Placement)
questions.content: Is the CE marking affixed **before** the product with digital elements is placed on the market?

responses.title: In Progress
responses.description: Work is underway but not yet completed.

questions.title: Additional Marks or Cybersecurity Pictograms
questions.content: Do you ensure that any additional marks, cybersecurity pictograms, or special symbols (if required by implementing acts under paragraph 6) **do not interfere with the CE marking**?

responses.title: In Progress
responses.description: Work is underway but not yet completed.

questions.title: Identification Number of the Notified Body (If Applicable)
questions.content:
If a notified body is involved in conformity assessment:
- Is the **identification number** of the notified body placed next to the CE marking?
- Is the identification number affixed by the notified body, the manufacturer, or the authorised representative as required?

questions.title: Correct Use and Enforcement of CE Marking
questions.content: Are you aware that Member States might enforce rules preventing misuses of the markings?

responses.title: In Progress
responses.description: Work is underway but not yet completed.

questions.title: CE Marking Under Multiple Union Legislations
questions.content:
Where the product is also subject to other EU legislation requiring CE marking:
- Does the CE marking indicate **compliance with all applicable Union legislation**, including the CRA?

questions.title: Implementing Acts on Labels, Icons, Cybersecurity Indicators
questions.content: Are you prepared to comply with future **technical specifications for labels, pictograms, or marks** related to cybersecurity that the Commission may adopt?

responses.title: In Progress
responses.description: Work is underway but not yet completed.

questions.title: Cooperation with Commission and ADCO
questions.content:
Are you aware about implementing acts developed through Commission consultations with stakeholders and ADCO regarding cybersecurity labeling?
- The Commission may, by means of implementing acts, lay down technical specifications for labels, pictograms or any other marks related to the security of the products with digital elements, their support periods and mechanisms to promote their use and to increase public awareness about the security of products with digital elements.

responses.title: In Progress
responses.description: Work is underway but not yet completed.
